sqlMap.sql:
SELECT vessel_name ,vessel_use ,vessel_type ,vessel_mmsi ,vessel_company ,CONVERT(VARCHAR, input_date, 23) AS input_date FROM TB_VESSEL_H
vessel_name like '%$vessel_name$%'
vessel_type like '%$vessel_type$%'
vessel_mmsi like '%$vessel_mmsi$%'
vessel_use=#vessel_use#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_VESSEL_H WHERE vessel_name in
#[]#
SELECT *,B.vessel_abbr FROM TB_VESSEL_H A, TB_VESSEL_ABBR B WHERE A.vessel_name = B.vessel_name

SELECT vessel_name ,vessel_use ,vessel_type ,vessel_mmsi ,vessel_company ,CONVERT(VARCHAR, input_date, 23) AS input_date
FROM TB_VESSEL_H
vessel_name like '%$vessel_name$%'
vessel_type = #vessel_type#
vessel_mmsi like '%$vessel_mmsi$%'
vessel_use=#vessel_use#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY vessel_name)
AS ROWNUM ,vessel_name ,vessel_use ,vessel_type ,vessel_mmsi ,vessel_company ,CONVERT(VARCHAR, input_date, 23) AS input_date FROM TB_VESSEL_H WITH (NOLOCK)
) T
WHERE T.ROWNUM BETWEEN (#PAGE_NO# - 1) * #PAGE_SIZE# + 1 AND #PAGE_NO# * #PAGE_SIZE#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY vessel_name)
AS ROWNUM ,vessel_name ,vessel_use ,vessel_type ,vessel_mmsi ,vessel_company ,CONVERT(VARCHAR, input_date, 23) AS input_date FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_VESSEL_H AS TBL where TBL.vessel_name in ( SELECT vessel_name FROM TB_VESSEL_ABBR WHERE vessel_abbr like '%$vessel_abbr$%' GROUP BY vessel_name ) ) AS TBL2
) T
WHERE T.ROWNUM BETWEEN (#PAGE_NO# - 1) * #PAGE_SIZE# + 1 AND #PAGE_NO# * #PAGE_SIZE#
SELECT * /*selectVesselDetailByKey*/ FROM TB_VESSEL_ABBR WHERE vessel_name =#vessel_name# AND vessel_abbr =#vessel_abbr#
select vessel_abbr from TB_VESSEL_ABBR where vessel_abbr=#vessel_abbr# group by vessel_abbr

select * from TB_VESSEL_H
where vessel_name like '%$vessel_name$%'

select * from TB_VESSEL_ABBR
where vessel_name like '%$vessel_name$%'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_VESSEL_H SET vessel_type=#vessel_type# ,vessel_use=#vessel_use# ,vessel_company=#vessel_company# ,vessel_mmsi=#vessel_mmsi# WHERE vessel_name=#vessel_name#
UPDATE TB_VESSEL_H SET vessel_type=#vessel_type# ,vessel_use=#vessel_use# ,vessel_company=#vessel_company# ,vessel_mmsi=#vessel_mmsi# WHERE vessel_name=#vessel_name#
UPDATE TB_VESSEL_H SET vessel_type=#vessel_type# ,vessel_use=#vessel_use# ,vessel_company=#vessel_company# ,vessel_mmsi=#vessel_mmsi# WHERE vessel_name=#vessel_name#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from TB_VESSEL_ABBR where vessel_name= #vessel_name#
and vessel_abbr=#vessel_abbr#
DELETE FROM TB_VESSEL_ABBR WHERE vessel_name= #vessel_name# AND vessel_abbr=#vessel_abbr#
